senses.sense_definition: A person, device, or mechanism that maintains equilibrium, stability, or equal distribution.

examples.text: The server uses a load <w>balancer</w> to distribute incoming traffic efficiently.
He held a long pole as a <w>balancer</w> while walking across the narrow beam.

senses.sense_definition: An acrobat or performer who specializes in feats of balancing.

examples.text: The <w>balancer</w> amazed the audience by stacking chairs on his chin.
Every circus act included a skilled <w>balancer</w> on the high wire.

senses.sense_definition: One of the modified hind wings of certain insects, such as flies, used to maintain stability during flight; a haltere.

examples.text: The fly uses its <w>balancer</w> to detect changes in direction while flying.
Under the microscope, the tiny <w>balancer</w> looked like a small club.
